alert.note: Alert for Searcy (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 16 at 2:40AM CST until February 16 at 3:15AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Searcy County in north central Arkansas... * Until 315 AM CST. * At 240 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Watts, or near Marshall, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Marshall... Marsena... Elberta... Watts... Leslie... Zach... Canaan... Morning Star... Lone Pine... TORNADO...POSSIBLE THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
